snippet: The Jets’ defense stopped Arizona on all 15 of its third-down opportunities and held the Cardinals to 137 net yards while quarterback Greg McElroy provided a needed spark in a 7-6 victory.
abstract: New York Jets defense dominates Arizona Cardinals; stop Cardinals on all 15 of its third-down opportunities and hold team to 137 net yards.
lead_paragraph: The Jets’ defense stopped Arizona on all 15 of its third-down opportunities and held the Cardinals to 137 net yards while quarterback Greg McElroy provided a needed spark in a 7-6 victory.

headline.seo: Jets’ Defense Gives Offense Do-Overs vs. Cardinals
headline.main: Jets’ Defense Gives Offense Plenty of Do-Overs
headline.print_headline: Defense Gives Offense Plenty of Do-Overs
